AT.name: Nintendo präsentiert: Style Boutique™
AT.description: Als Stilberater führen die Spieler ihre eigene Mode-Boutique. Sie wählen ihr Sortiment selbst aus, stellen sich der Konkurrenz auf Modenschauen, suchen neue Kleider und Accessoires im Online-Shop aus und spielen im Multiplayer-Modus mit anderen Fashion-Expertinnen und -Experten. Zunächst gilt es, sich vom einfachen Ladengehilfen langsam nach oben zu arbeiten, indem man Kunden zu ihrem Outfit berät. Wer erfolgreich verkaufen will, muss sorgfältig darauf achten, den individuellen Stil und die Persönlichkeit jedes Kunden möglichst genau zu treffen. Sobald die Spieler ihre eigene Boutique besitzen, ist ihre Kreativität gefordert: Sie können Schaufensterpuppen stylen, Atmosphäre, Ausstattung und Hintergrundmusik ihres Geschäfts bestimmen, Werbemails versenden, einen Ausverkauf veranstalten und vieles mehr.

AU.name: Nintendo presents: Style Boutique™
AU.description: Nintendo presents: Style Boutique challenges you to run your own fashion store as a style consultant, hand-pick your own stock, take part in Fashion Contests, choose new clothes from the online shop and even play against other consultants with multiplayer mode. Working your way up from shop assistant in a store, you can offer clothing advice and outfits for customers. With each customer having their own style and personality, you need to choose their clothes carefully to make a successful sale. Soon you’ll be the owner of your own store and using your creativity to style the mannequins, dictate the atmosphere by choosing the interior and music, create promotional Mailouts and decide when to hold sales. Each sale brings extra funds into the store enabling you to buy more stock.

BG.name: Nintendo presents: Style Boutique™
BG.description: Nintendo presents: Style Boutique challenges you to run your own fashion store as a style consultant, hand-pick your own stock, take part in Fashion Contests, choose new clothes from the online shop and even play against other consultants with multiplayer mode. Working your way up from shop assistant in a store, you can offer clothing advice and outfits for customers. With each customer having their own style and personality, you need to choose their clothes carefully to make a successful sale. Soon you’ll be the owner of your own store and using your creativity to style the mannequins, dictate the atmosphere by choosing the interior and music, create promotional Mailouts and decide when to hold sales. Each sale brings extra funds into the store enabling you to buy more stock.

BE.name: Nintendo présente : La Maison du style™
BE.description: Dans Nintendo présente : La Maison du style, votre mission est de tenir votre propre boutique de mode en tant que styliste, de sélectionner vos propres collections, de participer à des concours de mode, de choisir de nouvelles tenues sur la boutique en ligne et même de jouer contre d'autres stylistes grâce au mode multijoueur. Vous commencez au bas de l'échelle en tant qu'assistante dans une boutique et vous pourrez ensuite évoluer en conseillant vêtements et tenues aux clients. Comme chaque client a son propre style et sa personnalité, il vous faudra faire des choix judicieux pour réussir vos ventes. Vous deviendrez rapidement propriétaire de votre propre boutique et vous devrez faire appel à votre créativité pour habiller les mannequins, établir votre atmosphère en choisissant la décoration et la musique, créer votre communication promotionnelle et décider quand faire des soldes. Chaque vente vous rapporte des fonds supplémentaires qui vous permettent de compléter votre collection.

movies.name: Nintendo présente : La Maison du style™ : vidéo

ES.name: Nintendo presenta: Style Boutique™
ES.description: Nintendo presenta: Style Boutique te reta a llevar tu propio negocio, una tienda de ropa, a seleccionar el inventario, a participar en concursos de moda, a elegir nuevos modelitos en la tienda online y a competir contra otros jugadores en el modo multijugador. Comenzarás como dependienta en una tienda en la que podrás ofrecer consejo a tus clientes sobre sus estilismos. Cada cliente tiene sus propios gustos y preferencias, así que tendrás que tenerlos en cuenta a la hora de elegir las prendas que le quieras vender. Pronto tendrás tu propio establecimiento, en el que utilizar tu creatividad para vestir a los maniquíes, crear ambiente con la música y decoración del interior, escribir folletos promocionales o decidir cuándo realizar rebajas. Con cada venta recaudarás nuevos fondos que te permitirán comprar más prendas.

IT.name: Nintendo presenta: Style Boutique™
IT.description: Nintendo presenta: Style Boutique ti invita ad amministrare il tuo negozio di moda come consulente di stile, curare personalmente l'assortimento, prendere parte a competizioni di moda, scegliere nuovi abiti dal negozio online e addirittura giocare contro altre consulenti in modalità multiplayer. Partendo dal ruolo di commessa in un negozio, potrai offrire ai clienti consigli sull'abbigliamento e proporre degli abbinamenti. Ogni cliente ha il proprio stile e la propria personalità, e dovrai quindi scegliere con attenzione i vestiti giusti per riuscire a concludere la vendita. In poco tempo diventerai la padrona di un negozio tutto tuo e dovrai usare la tua creatività per abbigliare i manichini, dettare l'atmosfera scegliendo l'arredamento e la musica, creare campagne promozionali e decidere quando iniziare i saldi. Ogni capo venduto porterà nuovi fondi al negozio, che ti permetteranno di ampliare il tuo assortimento.

NL.name: Nintendo presents: Style Boutique™
NL.description: In Nintendo presents: Style Boutique kun je als styliste je eigen winkel openen en zelf bepalen welke kleding je daarin wilt verkopen. Je kunt meedoen aan modeshows, online naar nieuwe spulletjes snuffelen of het opnemen tegen andere stylistes. Je begint als assistente in een kledingwinkel, waar je mensen adviseert over hun outfits. Elke klant heeft zijn eigen stijl en persoonlijkheid, dus moet je goed nadenken over je adviezen om je klanten tevreden te stellen. Al snel kun je ook je eigen winkel openen. Je bepaalt zelf hoe deze winkel wordt ingericht, voorziet de etalagepoppen van je nieuwste producten, kiest de achtergrondmuziek, verstuurt reclamemateriaal en stelt vast wanneer de uitverkoop begint. Elke tevreden klant brengt geld in het laatje en dat geld kun je goed gebruiken om nieuwe collecties aan te schaffen.

NZ.name: Nintendo presents: Style Boutique™
NZ.description: Nintendo presents: Style Boutique challenges you to run your own fashion store as a style consultant, hand-pick your own stock, take part in Fashion Contests, choose new clothes from the online shop and even play against other consultants with multiplayer mode. Working your way up from shop assistant in a store, you can offer clothing advice and outfits for customers. With each customer having their own style and personality, you need to choose their clothes carefully to make a successful sale. Soon you’ll be the owner of your own store and using your creativity to style the mannequins, dictate the atmosphere by choosing the interior and music, create promotional Mailouts and decide when to hold sales. Each sale brings extra funds into the store enabling you to buy more stock.

PT.name: Nintendo Presents: Style Boutique™
PT.description: Nintendo presents: Style Boutique desafia-te a gerir a tua própria loja de roupa como consultora de moda, a escolher a dedo o teu próprio stock, a participar em concursos de moda, a escolher novas roupas na loja online e até a jogar contra outros consultores no modo Multijogadores. Subindo na carreira a partir de uma simples assistente de loja, podes oferecer conselhos de moda e modelos aos clientes e uma vez que cada um deles tem o seu estilo muito próprio, precisarás de escolher as suas roupas cuidadosamente se quiseres ser bem sucedido nas vendas. Em breve serás o proprietário da tua própria loja e usando a tua criatividade para vestir os manequins, ditarás a atmosfera escolhendo o interior e a música, criarás acções de promoção e decidirás quando realizar vendas. Cada venda significará mais dinheiro para a tua loja, o que te permitirá comprar mais artigos para o teu stock.

RU.name: Nintendo presents: Style Boutique™
RU.description: Nintendo presents: Style Boutique ставит перед вами цель достижения успеха в качестве владельца модного магазина, работая консультантом по стилю, собственноручно подбирая товар, участвуя в Fashion Contests (конкурсах моды), выбирая новую одежду из онлайн магазинов и даже играя против других консультантов в многопользовательском режиме. Начните вашу карьеру с позиции продавца, давая советы по одежде клиентам магазина. Каждому покупателю присущ свой собственный стиль и индивидуальность, потому, если вы хотите успешно совершать продажи, вам нужно быть очень осторожным при подборе одежды. Совсем скоро вы станете владельцем вашего собственного магазина и будете использовать вашу творческую сторону для выбора стиля манекенов, создания желаемой атмосферы при выборе интерьера и музыки, разработки рекламных Mailouts (буклетов) и выбора дат для распродаж. Каждая распродажа приносит дополнительный доход вашему магазину, что позволит вам приобретать еще больше товара.
